io.apptik.rxhub

Interface RxHub

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRxHub, DefaultRxHub

    public interface RxHub
    RxJava based Hub connecting Observables and Observers so that Observers can receive events without knowledge of which Observables, if any, there are, while maintaining clear connection between them.
    See Also:
    AbstractRxHub

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  RxHub.Source

    • Method Detail

      • addProvider

        void addProvider(java.lang.Object tag,
                 rx.Observable provider)
        Subscribes Node to Observable. If there is no Node with the specific tag a new one will be created except if the node is of type RxHub.NodeType.ObservableRef
        Parameters:
        tag - the ID of the Node
        provider - the Observable to subscribe to

      • removeProvider

        void removeProvider(java.lang.Object tag,
                    rx.Observable provider)
        Unsubscribe Observable from a Node
        Parameters:
        tag - the ID of the Node
        provider - the Observable to unsubscribe from

      • clearProviders

        void clearProviders()
        Clears all subscriptions of all Nodes

      • getNode

        rx.Observable getNode(java.lang.Object tag)
        Returns the Node Observable identified by the tag
        Parameters:
        tag - the ID of the Node
        Returns:
        the Node Observable

      • getNodeFiltered

        <T> rx.Observable<T> getNodeFiltered(java.lang.Object tag,
                                     java.lang.Class<T> filterClass)
        Type safe variant of getNode(Object). Returns the Node Observable identified by the tag and filtered by the Class provided
        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type of the events the returned Observable will emit
        Parameters:
        tag - the ID of the Node
        filterClass - the Class to filter the observable by
        Returns:
        the Filtered Node Observable

      • emit

        void emit(java.lang.Object tag,
          java.lang.Object event)
        Manually emit event to a specific Node. In order to prohibit this behaviour override this
        Parameters:
        tag - the ID of the Node
        event - the Event to emit

      • getNodeType

        RxHub.NodeType getNodeType(java.lang.Object tag)

        boolean isNodeThreadsafe(java.lang.Object tag)
